title: Fragment of a list of names

editionAuthor.title: Onomastica e suddivisioni civiche ad Akrai alla luce di nuovi frammenti epigrafici
editionAuthor.citation: Marco Vinci, «Onomastica e suddivisioni civiche ad Akrai alla luce di nuovi frammenti epigrafici», Mediterraneo Antico 25 (2022): 229–40

support: Fragment of a limestone stele, broken on all sides

layout.p: Parts of 8 lines of ancient Greek, no margins preserved.

handNote.lettering: Plainly cut letters, seemingly slightly irregular in size, heavily worn. Alpha possibly with broken bar; theta with central dot rather than cross-bar; sigma appears slightly open

provenanceFound._: Found during excavations in 2008-2009 on the mediaeval castle of Palazzolo Acreide, in the proximity of foundations of a building on the summit of the rock, attributed to an extra-mural sanctuary of the Greek period
